Pour une utilisation de l'application, v: To use the application, you must know certain terms of conditions of use.
Dans le cas où l'application vous demand: In the event that the application asks you to authenticate with Google, certain elements will be retrieved for proper interpretation of the data.
Et aussi, savoir que certaines données n: The data we process when you use Google:
Les données que nous traitions lorsque v: The data we process when you use Google:
Lorsque vous créez un compte Google, nou: When you create a Google account, we store the information you provide us with your name, photo, email address and phone number.
Lorsque vous utilisez les services Googl: When you use Google services to do things like submit or signal a wild dump or share the trash experience with others.
Lorsque vous recherchez un endroit sur G: When you search for a place on Google Maps or look at a, we process information about this activity - including information such as IP address, cookie data, device identifiers and location.
Nous traitions également les information: We also process the information described above when you use the application.
Nous traitions ces données pour les rais: We processed this data for the reasons described in our policy, including for:
Aider nos services à fournir du contenu: Help our Services provide more useful and personalized content, such as than more relevant search results based on your preferences and usage history;
Améliorer la qualité de nos services et: Improve the quality of our services and develop them;
Fournir des annonces personnalisées en f: Provide personalized ads based on your account settings, both on Google services and on Google partner sites and applications;
Améliorer la sécurité en protégeant cont: Improve security by protecting against fraud and abuse;
Résoudre les problèmes techniques et fou: Resolve technical problems and provide technical support services.
Par exemple, en fonction de vos paramètr: For example, based on your account settings, we show you ads based on information about your interests, that we can infer from your use of Search and YouTube, and we use data from billions of search queries to build spelling correction models that we use across all our services.
Vous êtes maître de vos données: You are the master of your data
En fonction de vos paramètres d'utilisat: Depending on your user settings, some of this data may be associated with your Google account and we treat this data as personal information. You can control how we collect and use this data by clicking 'Additional options' below. You can always adjust your control settings later or withdraw your consent for the future.
'Usaf'ty' est une solution réalisée par: 'Usaf'ty ' is a solution created by the GDSC Community - Google Developer Student Club - from the Catholic University of Bukavu for the city of Bukavu and its surroundings, a solution aimed at putting the agencies responsible for waste management in the city and the population in direct contact.
Cette Solution a été conçu à l'occasion: This Solution was designed on the occasion of the Solution Challenge organized each year by Google. The solutions of this challenge aim to provide solutions to local problems from one environment to another while referring to the SDGs - Sustainable Development Goals - of the United Nations.
D'où nous avons ciblé ce souci qui est a: From where we targeted this concern which is as extreme as it is deadly for our city and its population, taking into account SDGs No. 3, No. 11 and No. 12, we gave ourselves the following missions:
de pouvoir donner accès à la communicati: to be able to provide access to communication between urban waste collection agencies and the population;
de sensibiliser la population sur l'impa: to raise awareness among the population about the negative impact of waste (the diseases that result from it, climate pollution, etc.);
de donner les normes et les bonnes maniè: to give the standards and good manners for the waste management (sorting) with the aim of already helping these agencies before they collect them;
de donner certaines bonnes pratiques de: to give certain good practices to return certain waste useful for responsible reuse ;
Ainsi, pour atteindre ces objectifs, nou: So, to achieve these objectives, we ask everyone to put our hands together, as we say: " Kidole kimoja hakiui mbu " - One finger does not kill a mosquito -
Soyons tous acteurs pour le bien de notr: Let’s all be actors for the good of our city, our planet!
Veuillez vous connecter pour d'autres in: Please log in for further information!
Veux-tu te déconnecter ?: Do you want to log out?
Merci pour votre feedback, nous en prend: Thank you for your feedback, we will take note of it...
